blogPost.excerpt:
In this video I show you what it looked like when you paint an entire room with the world's brightest paint, called LIT. This is a continuation of the first video I did in which I painted my room with the darkest paint in the world (Musou Black). Watch how bright a room can glow on it's own!

Get Your Experiment Box Here: https://theactionlab.com/
Checkout my experiment book: https://amzn.to/2Wf07x1
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/theactionlabman
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theactionlabofficial/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/therealactionlab/
blogPost.body:
In this video I show you what it looked like when you paint an entire room with the world's brightest paint, called LIT. This is a continuation of the first video I did in which I painted my room with the darkest paint in the world (Musou Black). Watch how bright a room can glow on it's own!

Get Your Experiment Box Here: https://theactionlab.com/
Checkout my experiment book: https://amzn.to/2Wf07x1
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/theactionlabman
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theactionlabofficial/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/therealactionlab/
blogPost.title: Painting My Entire Room With The World's Brightest Paint...Then Turning on a 100,000 Lumen Light!
blogPost.author: The Action Lab

localize.title: 用世界上最亮的油漆粉刷我的整个房间......然后打开一盏10万流明的灯!
localize.description:
在这段视频中，我向你展示了当你用世界上最亮的油漆，称为LIT，画出整个房间的样子。这是我做的第一个视频的延续，在这个视频中，我用世界上最黑暗的油漆（Musou Black）画了我的房间。看看一个房间有多亮，它自己就能发光!

在这里得到你的实验箱：https://theactionlab.com/
看看我的实验书：https://amzn.to/2Wf07x1
在Twitter上关注我：https://twitter.com/theactionlabman
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theactionlabofficial/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/therealactionlab/

localize.title: 用世界上最亮的油漆粉刷我的整個房間......然後打開一盞10萬流明的燈!
localize.description:
在這段視頻中，我向你展示了當你用世界上最亮的油漆，稱爲LIT，畫出整個房間的樣子。這是我做的第一個視頻的延續，在這個視頻中，我用世界上最黑暗的油漆（Musou Black）畫了我的房間。看看一個房間有多亮，它自己就能發光!

在這裏得到你的實驗箱：https://theactionlab.com/
看看我的實驗書：https://amzn.to/2Wf07x1
在Twitter上關注我：https://twitter.com/theactionlabman
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theactionlabofficial/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/therealactionlab/

BWF TV is the official channel of the Badminton World Federation (BWF), where we bring to you live, catch-up and delayed streaming of the big events on the HSBC BWF World Tour, as well as the majors like the TOTAL BWF Thomas and Uber Cup Finals and the TOTAL BWF World Championships. Plus enjoy a range of other exclusive content including the latest highlights and interviews as well as our top-rating magazine show Badminton Unlimited.
